description:
exp/norm: Updated documentation to better reflect actual behavior.
Fixes issue 3596.

messages.text:
also please lower-case and present-tense the CL description: s/Updated/update/

http://codereview.appspot.com/6200056/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/norm/iter.go
File src/pkg/exp/norm/iter.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6200056/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/norm/iter.go#newcode70
src/pkg/exp/norm/iter.go:70: // typically give better performance.
that's too vague to be helpful. what does larger mean? 1K? 1M? 1G? the size of the final string?

Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg
